name: Planetary Fighterz
description:
Packaging didn't work so here's the raw unreal file. Also some bugs with health bar (it still works but both characters share a health bar). No victory screen yet so just use your imagination.

Keyboard controls for player 1, controller for player 2

Double tap S[PACE] or [A] on controller to jump and begin flight

[Shift] or [RB] to accelerate 

[Mouse1] or [X] to attack

Other hidden controls, see if you can figure them out

Also hidden 4 different asteroids around the map, see if you can find them all.

Have Fun!
